replies.txt_content:

Spigot:https://ci.mcadmin.net/job/Spi ...

错误: 尝试打开文件spigot-1.11.jar时出现意外错误
请按任意键继续. . .

replies.author: Lss233
replies.txt_content:
Spigot下载地址用这个：
http://cloud.darksky.cc/d/b3b82fc8a5/

Paper允许不了确定不是因为你没改启动脚本？你可以把paperclip.jar重命名为spigot-1.11.jar,也可以编辑启动脚本，把spigot-1.11.jar改成paperclip.jar
